title: arabic inspired type
content:
Anybody know any good examples of arabic inspired logotypes or typefaces? I’m doing an identity  
where I want to render English words in an arabic style, not using the actual arabic characters.  
I’ve already got a load of arabic patterns and typefaces as a starting point.

I may be going for a crest type logo so any strong examples of contemporary crests would be interesting.

Ed

 [‹ 1967/1968 Ganster Typography](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126132314/http:/www.typophile.com/node/13780 "Go to previous forum topic") [Typophile contact details ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126132314/http:/www.typophile.com/node/13870 "Go to next forum topic")
author: wattsisname

comments.content:
i know alot of examples ofcourse as being arabic typographer, but I am not sure to find them on net. Any way I like this logo very much  
it is a logo for advertising company in Egypt called “Al Resala” which means the message  
 [http://www.deviantart.com/view/15685717/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126132314/http:/www.deviantart.com/view/15685717/ "http://www.deviantart.com/view/15685717/")
